sentences.en: A second later a raincoat caught her eye.
sentences.cn: 不一会儿,她便看上了一件雨衣.

sentences.en: Don't forget to take your raincoat along.
sentences.cn: 别忘了带雨衣.

sentences.en: He dipped in his raincoat pocket.
sentences.cn: 他把手深深地伸进雨衣口袋里。

sentences.en: He had no raincoat on when the rain started.
sentences.cn: 开始下雨时他没穿雨衣.

sentences.en: He set out armed with a raincoat and an umbrella.
sentences.cn: 他带着一件雨衣和一把雨伞出发了.

sentences.en: He wore a belted raincoat that accentuated his portly middle.
sentences.cn: 他穿着一件系腰带的雨衣，使他发福的腰身更加显眼。

sentences.en: If I had taken my raincoat with me this morning, I would not be wet now.
sentences.cn: (从句指过去,主句指现在)。如果我今天早上带了雨衣，现在就不会被淋湿了。

sentences.en: It looks like rain. You'd better take your raincoat with you.
sentences.cn: 看来要下雨了, 你还是带上雨衣吧.

sentences.en: MODINE: No rumpled raincoat. I have to ask you some questions now.
sentences.cn: 摩丁： 没有皱皱的雨衣。我现在得问你一些问题了。

sentences.en: My face and raincoat were soaking wet.
sentences.cn: 我的脸上、雨衣上处处湿淋淋的。

sentences.en: On seeing the downpour, she belted ( up ) her raincoat.
sentences.cn: 一看到倾盆大雨, 她就用皮带束好雨衣.

sentences.en: She belted ( up ) her raincoat.
sentences.cn: 她把雨衣的腰带系上.

sentences.en: She pinned the poppy to his raincoat.
sentences.cn: 她把罂粟花别在了他的雨衣上。

sentences.en: She pulled off her raincoat before entering the room.
sentences.cn: 她进屋前先脱掉雨衣.

sentences.en: She wore her wine-coloured gaberdine raincoat.
sentences.cn: 她穿着深红色华达呢雨衣。

sentences.en: The dark clouds remembered me to take my raincoat along.
sentences.cn: 乌云提醒我带上雨衣。

sentences.en: There was something familiar about him, his fawn raincoat, his thinness, the way he moved.
sentences.cn: 他有点眼熟——浅黄褐色雨衣，瘦削的身影，走路的姿态。

sentences.en: You can hang up your raincoat there.
sentences.cn: 你可以把雨衣挂在那儿。

sentences.en: You can't go out without a raincoat. It's teeming.
sentences.cn: 你不穿雨衣出去可不行. 外面正在下大雨.

sentences.en: You had better put on your raincoat, for it is raining.
sentences.cn: 你最好穿上你的雨衣, 因为天在下雨.

trans.tran_en: a coat that you wear to protect yourself from rain
